data.title: Michelle A. Lupo Obituary
data.meta_description: MICHELLE A. LUPO (nee Sbrocco) age 72, beloved wife for 53 years of Robert; loving mother of Jay (wife Katie), Corrie (husband Jacob) and Michael; devoted Nana of Tara, Grace an...
data.text:
MICHELLE A. LUPO (nee Sbrocco) age 72, beloved wife for 53 years of Robert; loving mother of Jay (wife Katie), Corrie (husband Jacob) and Michael; devoted Nana of Tara, Grace and Emma; cherished daughter of the late Frances (nee Tartaglia) and Michael Sbrocco; dearest sister of the late Patricia Roth (husband George deceased); dear niece, aunt, great-aunt, cousin and friend of many.

Michelle was born in Cleveland on April 19,1951 and passed away on December 8, 2023. She was a graduate of Ursuline High School, Class of 1969. Michelle and Robert had a wonderful family and she spent her days taking care of them. She was a member of St. Gabriel Catholic Church where she served as a Eucharistic Minister. She truly enjoyed volunteering her time to help others and the Hospice of the Western Reserve was close to her heart. Michelle enjoyed cooking, spending time with her grandchildren and being involved in their activities. Her family describes her as a passionate woman who was caring, loving, giving and outgoing. She was friendly and social with a great sense of humor. Michelleâ€™s devotion to her family and to her faith will never be forgotten.

In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in memory of Michelle to The Hospice of the Western Reserve, P.O. Box 72101, Cleveland, OH 44192.

Cremation by DeJohn Crematory.

Relatives and friends are requested to meet for the Mass of Christian Burial Friday, December 15, 2023, at 1 PM at St. Gabriel Catholic Church, 9925 Johnnycake Ridge Rd, Concord. Private Burial at a later date.

Family will receive friends to pay tribute to and celebrate the life of Michelle at THE DeJOHN-FLYNN-MYLOTT FUNERAL HOME OF WILLOUGHBY HILLS, 28890 CHARDON ROAD (between Bishop Rd. and Rt. 91) THURSDAY from 3-7 PM.
